about.bio: I am a passionate Software Engineer with experience in developing robust financial systems and web applications. I specialize in full-stack development using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and React Native. My work focuses on creating secure, scalable, and user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.

description: Worked on debit and credit money operations systems.
Developed and maintained software applications to support financial transactions.
Improved system reliability and performance by debugging and optimizing code.
Collaborated with IT teams to ensure secure and efficient digital payment services.
Assisted in software development and system support tasks.
Learned best practices in financial software development.
Contributed to team projects and code reviews.

education.institution: Amoud University – Faculty of Information Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
